name: X^2: Calamity
description:
Version: 1.0.1

A early access sequel to the game x^3 Armageddon ! 

- CONTENTS -

2 Worlds (5 levels each and 2 of them are bosses)

2 bonus/secret levels

4 Enemies

2 Bosses

a soundtrack made by me because im so cool and biased

- ENEMIES  -

  Fraction Knight (Moves left to right or up and down) (dmg; 1) (appears in level 1-3)

 Fused Hedge (boss enemy) (to ignite, dash into it to damage the boss)

  Hedge Spinner (Spins around) (dmg; 1) (appears in level 2-1)

 Ignited Knight (boss enemy) (click to destroy the fuse)

 RC Cube Tracker (RCCT) (accelerates and moves towards the player)

- BOSSES -

 King Hedge

to attack, dash into the Fused Hedge to send it back at him

Denominator

to attack click on the Ignited Knights to prevent them from getting to close and blowing you up
